definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)

sentences.english: The connection is made by a specific user and made from a trusted client.
sentences.chinese: 连接由一个特定用户实现，并在可信任的客户端进行。

sentences.english: A trusted context is a database object defining the set of properties for a connection.
sentences.chinese: 可信任上下文是一个数据库对象，定义了连接的属性。

sentences.english: After the context structure is created, a trust certificate store must be loaded.
sentences.chinese: 在创建上下文结构之后，必须加载一个可信任证书库。

sentences.english: Members of on-line brand community are trustworthy.
sentences.chinese: 在虚拟品牌社区的会员都是可信任的。

sentences.english: One of either the trust store file or directory of certificates must be specified.
sentences.chinese: 必须指定可信任库文件或证书的目录。

sentences.english: China has made some progress in the trustworthy NGI area.
sentences.chinese: 中国在可信任下一代互联网方面已有一些研究进展。

definition: to trust/to have confidence in/to have faith in/to rely on
unidentified origin/no-one knows where it comes from/of dubious background
